sentences.en: An earthy , uncouth, servile peasant creature old Katy was.
sentences.cn: 老凯蒂真是个土里土气 、 恭顺的农民.

sentences.en: Full of or exhibiting servile compliance; fawning .
sentences.cn: 这辆运货马车装满了 蔬菜.

sentences.en: He is servile to his boss.
He spoke in a servile tone.
sentences.cn: 他用卑躬屈膝的腔调说话.

sentences.en: His servile expression of praise for his employer was disgusting to me.
sentences.cn: 他奉承雇主的那副奴颜婢膝的嘴脸令我恶心.

sentences.en: I don't like his servile manner.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢他那低叁下四的样子.

sentences.en: If you're very servile and humble we may give you another one next week.
sentences.cn: 如果你十分卑下,十分驯服,下星期也许我们再给你一张.

sentences.en: Shake off all the fears of servile prejudices, under which weak minds are servilely crouched.
sentences.cn: 抛下所有奴性偏见的恐惧, 在那里微弱的心灵奴婢般地蜷缩著.

sentences.en: Smile from the heart, servile, neither the weak fool, or the flattery of the powerful.
sentences.cn: 微笑发自内心, 不卑不亢, 既不是对弱者的愚弄, 也不是对强者的奉承.

sentences.en: They said she had a servile attitude to her employer.
sentences.cn: 他们说她对她的老板阿谀逢迎。

sentences.en: What weakness is it that you can never tolerate and servile flattery.
sentences.cn: 你最不能容忍的缺点是什么?—-奴颜婢膝.

sentences.en: What weakness is it that you can never tolerate? --- Sycophancy and servile flattery.
sentences.cn: 你最不能容忍的缺点是什么? ---- 奴颜婢膝.
